publisher.publisher-name: College of Business Administration of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln

abstract.p: This paper presents a financial rationale for a wealthaximizing firm to set a price for its output below or above the profit-maximizing level. The capital asset pricing model (CAPM) is used to choose the optimal price for a firm is product. The possible advantages of this approach and some of the economic determinants of product price in a CAPM gramework are developed in the paper.
